taskCreatedMessage: Podcast generation task has been started, Task ID
howToUseSubtitle: Get started with PodcastHub and create professional podcasts easily
faqSubtitle: Answers to common questions about using our service

step1.title: 1. Input Content
step1.description: Enter the text you want to convert into a podcast in the text box. It can be articles, notes, or any text. Use story generator feature to quickly generate automatic podcast content.

step2.title: 2. Select Mode
step2.description: Choose between standard mode or AI story mode. Our podcast generator helps you create more engaging podcast scripts.

step3.title: 3. Configure Voice
step3.description: Select the appropriate voice role to customize your podcast audio.

step4.title: 4. Generate Podcast
step4.description: Click the generate button, and PodcastHub will automatically create professional podcast audio for you.

q1.question: What is PodcastHub?
q1.answer: PodcastHub is an intelligent podcast generation platform that quickly converts your text content into professional podcast audio. It supports multiple voices and AI generation modes.

q2.question: How to use the story generator feature?
q2.answer: When selecting AI story mode, the system automatically uses the immersive story feature to create vivid AI voice-over scripts.

q3.question: What languages are supported?
q3.answer: PodcastHub supports multiple languages including Chinese, English, Japanese, and more. You can choose the corresponding voice role based on your content.

q4.question: How long are generated podcasts saved?
q4.answer: To protect your privacy and save storage space, generated podcast audio is retained for 30 minutes. Please download and save it locally in time.

q5.question: How to get more credits?
q5.answer: You can purchase credit packages or sign up for free trial credits to get more generation attempts. New users receive free trial credits upon registration.

dataRetentionWarning: Data is only kept for 30 minutes, please download and save it as soon as possible
featureComingSoon: This feature is under development, please look forward to it.
